job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pWere looking for a Data Scientist for a music creation platform working to change the way we think about the ecosystem of music creation and production making it easier and more affordable for anyone at any skill level to create music at the touch of a buttonppbrppThis role requires is a specific skillset focused on learning scale and agility in the music tech space but we know youre out thereppbrppWere open to candidates from all over the US  ideally youd want to relocate to San Diego but happy to have a conversation about the best scenarioppbrppstrong BenefitsstrongpulliIndustryleading healthcare covering medical dental vision and life paid by the companyliliHealth Savings and Flexible Spending accountslili401KliliUnlimited PTO with an employeefocused work approachliliFlexible work schedule and a remotefriendly environmentliliParental leaveliliParticipation in profit sharinglili200 Pay on your BirthdayliliEmployee Referral Bonus ProgramliliMaternity Leave ProgramliliCompany outings retreats and events when permissibleliulpbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliCollect analyze and present processed and unprocessed data pertaining to music creation tech to make the business more powerful and increase enterprise opportunities To be honest the right person can probably better tell us how this role should work And well happily empower you to do thatliliDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithms in pertinence to business objectivesliliCollaborate with the engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to production make product adjustments and geek out on product opportunities GET FIRED UP sorryliliBased on the insights you gather make clear recommendations to improve and work with other department leads to executeliliHelp design data team hiring roadmapsliliProduce regular analytics reports for internal and external stakeholder board investor etc purposesliulpbrppstrongRequirements and some nicetohavesstrongpulliBachelors in statistics comp sci math engineeringliliDeep MLAI experience including machine learning modeling and ensemble methodologyliliPython expertise NumPy SciPy SQL MongoDB CliliUnderstanding of digital signal processing techniques filtering spectralFFT analysis convolution etcliliExperience with machine learning especially as it applies to music analysis andor generationliliExperience with the following technologies Django Heroku AWS S3liliFamiliarity with python audio processing libraries such as LibrosaliliPassion for or experience in music  ML production and creationliul
